summary: A crook quietly plots his revenge against the boss who murdered his brother while working for him.
cast: Seann William Scott|Timm Sharp|Patrick Breen|John B. Crye|Suzy Nakamura|Lou Diamond Phillips|Dave Foley|Kavan Smith|Paul Hungerford|Monet Mazur|Jody Racicot|Terry Chen|Yee Jee Tso|Ty Olsson|Carl McDonald|C. Ernst Harth|Reagan Dale Neis|Natassia Malthe|Christine Chatelain|Ryan Robbins|Michael Eklund|Damonde Tschritter|John Beuhler|Fred Ewanuick|Michael Roselli|Robert Astles|Phillip Beer|Stefanie Ford|Adam Arkin
title: El plan: Un golpe a todo volumen
